#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define lim 1000003
vector<string>v[lim+1];
#define pb push_back
int main()
{
  ll t;
  cin>>t;
  string s1,s2;
  double p,q,r,s;
  while(t--)
  {
  cin>>p>>q>>r>>s;
  double den=(q*s)-(q-p)*(s-r);
  double num=p*s;
  printf("%.5lf",num/den);
  cout<<endl;
}
}
